title: Easy Vegetarian Pasta
ingredients: ['1 (500g) pack wholewheat spaghetti', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '3 large tomatoes, diced', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 yellow pepper, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '100g (4 oz) chopped courgette', '50g (2 oz) fresh mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '100g (4 oz) crumbled feta cheese']
